amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to acquire a camera for the purpose of collecting or storing vehicle license plate numbers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to acquire a camera for the purpose of collecting or storing vehicle license plate numbers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A079) Agreed to by recorded vote: 297 - 129 (Roll no. 327).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A079) Agreed to by recorded vote: 297 - 129 (Roll no. 327).
